specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Sustainability Certification > BCI The Better Cotton Initiative is a global, not-for-profit organization, which is the largest cotton sustainability program in the world. BCI aims to transform cotton production worldwide by introducing sustainable best practices in the initial stage of its production. Recommended Use T-shirts
